text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/DeepTutor | 95% | stars now 5564 → est 11692 (range 11656-11728)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/DeepTutor
2) huseyinbabal/taws | 93% | stars now 1202 → est 7096 (range 7071-7121)
   https://github.com/huseyinbabal/taws
3) AnmolSaini16/mapcn | 93% | stars now 3567 → est 7373 (range 7340-7406)
   https://github.com/AnmolSaini16/mapcn
4) numman-ali/cc-mirror | 91% | stars now 977 → est 3678 (range 3653-3703)
   https://github.com/numman-ali/cc-mirror
5) jarrodwatts/claude-hud | 90% | stars now 812 → est 2592 (range 2567-2617)
   https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-hud

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
